title: The car-hammer-explosion-tumblr Incident
description: After a controversial moderation decision to remove a User who posted they wished the CEO of the Social Media Platform tumblr "die[d] a forever death involving a car covered in hammers that explodes more than a few times and hammers go flying everywhere", a post by many to be understood to be satirical, and a badly received statement of the CEO, many users of the platform migrated to the fediverse.
